kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the
kw.msg: Get Request using : alias=acfun, uri=/, headers=None json=None

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=acfun, url=http://www.acfun.cn, headers={}, cookies=None, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get Request
kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the
kw.msg: Get Request using : alias=acfun, uri=/login/, headers=None json=None

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

suite.doc: A test suite containing tests related to invalid login. These tests are data-driven by they nature. They use a single keyword, specified with Test Template setting, that is called with different arguments to cover different scenarios.
